Title: Open alternative solution for the control of multicopter
Description: The solution is based on the conventional modelling components, platform Arduino, mobile system Windows Phone and operating system Windows.
HomeWiki:
Open ASCM is a solution that provides real-time control of the multicopter through the motion sensors of the smart phone and the monitoring of live images on the laptop. The solution is based on the conventional modelling components, platform Arduino, mobile system Windows Phone and operating system Windows.


Solution can also be used for other purposes. It is posible to control other type of RC toy as car or for example remote camera. remote camera example-youtube

 

Diagram for connection between arduino and RC transmitter through "trainer port". This is recommended option if you have RC transmitter because you can simply override control by unplugging the cable. The disadvantage is that you must configure "Trainer mode" on your Transmitter.

    

 

Second and cheaper option is presented below. This is "plug and use" option. We can use only replaceable RC transmitter module which can be bought separately. The disadvantage is only that we need an external voltage source between 6 and 12 volts (USB can only provide 5V). This option is also more risky to use because you can lose control of multicopter if anything goes wrong..
